What's New in Version 0.77 🚀⚡

  • Introduced Power Mode, which allows you to create app-specific enhancement settings
  • Fixed minor bugs and issues, along with other improvements

What's New in Version 0.76 🚀⚡

  • Added option to configure trigger mode for Assistant Mode (No more stuck with "Hey")

What's New in Version 0.75 🚀

  • Added Playback sound when recording starts and finishes (toggleable from Record View) 🔊
  • Redesigned the sidebar to make it more Mac native 🖥️
  • Removed mini recorder (now will only use the notch recorder) 📝
  • Removed separate example management system 📁
    • Now you can add different examples to different modes aka prompts for more relevant use cases
  • Minor improvements in UI & Styling 🎨

What's New in Version 0.74 🚀⚡

  • Added keyboard shortcut for toggling enhancement while recording (⌘E)
  • Added keyboard shortcut for switching prompts while recording (⌘1-9) ⌨️
  • Removed the custom prompt toggle(copy your existing prompt, they'll be reset in the update)
  • Fixed Audio Visualizer not working 🎵
  • Redesigned the prompt/examples view
